name: Apple Scab
cause: Fungus grows in cool, wet weather.
cure: Spray fungicide, plant strong apple types, and remove sick leaves.

name: Apple Black Rot
cure: Cut off bad parts and use fungicide.

name: Apple Cedar Apple Rust
cure: Remove juniper plants, use strong apple types, and spray fungicide.

name: Cherry Powdery Mildew
cure: Spray sulfur or fungicide and keep air moving around trees.

name: Corn Gray Leaf Spot
cure: Plant strong corn types and spray fungicide.

name: Corn Common Rust
cure: Spray fungicide and plant strong corn types.

name: Corn Northern Leaf Blight
cure: Use strong corn types and spray fungicide.

name: Grape Black Rot
cure: Cut off sick parts and spray fungicide.

name: Grape Black Measles
cure: Remove sick wood and avoid hurting vines.

name: Grape Leaf Blight
cure: Spray fungicide and keep vineyard clean.

name: Orange Citrus Greening
cure: Control insects and remove sick trees.

name: Peach Bacterial Spot
cure: Plant strong peach types and spray copper medicine.

name: Pepper Bacterial Spot
cure: Use copper spray and strong pepper types.

name: Potato Early Blight
cure: Spray fungicide and change crops each year.

name: Potato Late Blight
cure: Plant strong types and spray fungicide.

name: Squash Powdery Mildew
cure: Spray sulfur fungicide and keep air moving.

name: Strawberry Leaf Scorch
cure: Remove sick leaves and spray fungicide.

name: Tomato Bacterial Spot
cure: Spray copper medicine and change crops.

name: Tomato Early Blight
cure: Spray fungicide and remove sick leaves.

name: Tomato Late Blight
cure: Plant strong types and spray fungicide.

name: Tomato Leaf Mold
cure: Spray fungicide and keep air moving.

name: Tomato Septoria Leaf Spot
cure: Remove sick leaves and spray fungicide.

name: Tomato Spider Mites
cure: Spray bug medicine or soap.

name: Tomato Target Spot
cure: Spray fungicide and keep air moving.

name: Tomato Yellow Leaf Curl Virus
cure: Control whiteflies and plant strong tomato types.

name: Tomato Mosaic Virus
cause: Virus spreads by touch and dirty tools.
cure: Remove sick plants and clean tools.
